meta.description: Optimize the factory layout to maximize revenue from producing phones and laptops given space, cost, and labor constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced in the factory.

params.name: labor_hours
params.description: Labor hours required per sq. foot for each product.

params.name: cost_per_sqft
params.description: Cost per sq. foot for each product.

params.name: revenue_per_sqft
params.description: Revenue per sq. foot for each product.

vars.name: space
vars.description: Space allocated in sq. feet for each product.

objective.name: max_total_revenue
objective.description: Maximize total revenue from phones and laptops.

constraints.name: space_constraint
constraints.description: Total space allocated cannot exceed 100 sq. feet.

constraints.name: labor_constraint
constraints.description: Total labor hours cannot exceed 2000 hours.
